text:
Location: Shanghai, China

Remote: Yes

Willing to relocate: Yes, for the right opportunity

Technologies: HTML5/JS/CSS3, iOS (mostly Obj-C), C/C++, SQL, etc

Resume: https://logotype.se

Email: victor at logotype dot se

GitHub: https://github.com/logotype

About me: A swedish dude living in Asia for over half a decade. Genuine interest in programming and related fields, also a strong interest for design, motion and the intersection between art and code. I started my sole proprietorship (logotype) when I was 15 (i’m 32 now). Feel free to contact me, I’d love to work on something cool together!
